exceptions.tactic: intros V g f a l Hf Hg Hfa.
intros V' g f a l Hf Hg Hfa.
intros V' g' f a l Hf Hg Hfa.
intros V' g' f' a l Hf Hg Hfa.
intros V' g' f' a' l Hf Hg Hfa.
intros V' g' f' a' l' Hf Hg Hfa.

original: intros V g f a l Hf Hg Hfa. unfold is_derive, extension_cont. apply is_derive_ext_locally. - intros x Hx. unfold extension_cont. destruct (Rle_dec x a). + rewrite Hfa. reflexivity. + reflexivity. - apply is_derive_plus; auto. - apply is_derive_plus; auto.
